title: Sidewall, 1956
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Two alternating landscape vignettes. The first contains three cherubic boys, one with bow and arrow pointed up at birds flying overhead. The other contains a dog ready to retrieve the fowl, with tree and cattails. Reproduction of an 18th century design. Printed in pink, white and black on a light blue ground.

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1956.
1956. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-83.
